patterns.name: Clouds
patterns.svgMarkup:
<svg viewBox="0 0 400 240" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="240" fill="{bg}" />

  <!-- Row A: scallops (FG) -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="-20" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="60"  cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="140" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="300" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="380" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <circle cx="460" cy="140" r="60" fill="{fg}" />
    <!-- Mask bottom halves by covering with background -->
    <rect x="0" y="140" width="400" height="100" fill="{bg}" />
  </g>

  <!-- Row B: offset scallops (ACC) -->
  <g opacity="0.85">
    <circle cx="20"  cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <circle cx="100" cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <circle cx="260" cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <circle cx="340" cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <circle cx="420" cy="200" r="60" fill="{acc}" />
    <!-- Mask bottom halves -->
    <rect x="0" y="200" width="400" height="40" fill="{bg}" />
  </g>

  <!-- Subtle highlight bead -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="110" r="8" fill="{acc}" opacity="0.9"/>
</svg>
